participant_1.background:
Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.
i read tons of books.
i love reading mysteries in my free time.
I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous.
i ve been divorced for 2 years.

participant_2.background:
I value the memories I've made with my friends and family.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.
My children are my only living family members.
i now live in new mexico.
I am looking for a partner who is willing to be a parent to my children.

content.text: Hi, how are you today?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing pretty good too. I just moved to New Mexico last year and I'm still getting used to it.
Oh, that's exciting! I've lived in New Mexico my whole life and I love it here.
What do you like most about it?
I love the outdoors. There are so many beautiful places to hike, camp, and fish.
That's what I've heard! I'm looking forward to exploring more of it.
You definitely should! And if you're ever looking for someone to go hiking with, I'm always up for it.
Thanks, I'll keep that in mind!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play baseball, and spend time with my friends and family.
Baseball! That's awesome! I love baseball too. What's your favorite team?
My favorite team is the New York Yankees.
Oh, nice! I'm a big fan of the Boston Red Sox.
Oh no! We're rivals!
Haha, yes we are! But I'm sure we can still be friends, right?
Of course! I can't hate you just because you like the Red Sox.
Good! So, what are you looking for in a partner?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, compassionate, and understanding. Someone who I can be myself around and who will support me.
That sounds like a great list of qualities! I'm sure you'll find someone who is perfect for you.
Thanks! I hope so too.
So, what are you doing later?
I'm not sure yet. What are you up to?
I'm going to go out with my friends for dinner. Do you want to come with us?
That sounds fun! I'd love to join you.
Great! I'll text you the details.
Sounds good
